name: Loading.js
body:
## Usage

### Show

```
$.loading.show();
```

```
$.loading.show({fadeIn: 1000, callback: function(){ ... } });
```

[Demo](#)

***

### Hide

```
$.loading.hide();
```

```
$.loading.hide({fadeOut: 1000, callback: function(){ ... } });
```

[Demo](#)

***

### Check Showing

```
$.loading.isShowing();
```

[Demo](#)


## Advanced Options

see [source code](https://github.com/HondaDai/loading.js/blob/master/js/loading.js)
